name: Grid Gunner
description: A hardcore sci-fi rally racing game where winning comes second to survival and reaching the finish line in one piece is your goal.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3 CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 560 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
